description:
Altair Torte deploys to investigate a strange O`bli signature. The location of the signature is deep in the mountains, with a beautiful lake, and the team starts wanting to enjoy the scenery while they`re on their mission. Yuumi loves to cook, and is enticed by the large amount of mountain vegetables available, while Io changes into her swimsuit to search underwater, only to be inspected by an elated Mana. They finish their investigation, and Tierra gives the all clear, so the five of them decide to enjoy their time with Mother Nature.
Source: crunchyroll
